meanings.definition: Giving a feeling of comfort or coziness.
meanings.sent1: The soft blankets made the room feel homier.
meanings.sent2: The warm fireplace made the cabin homier.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy pillows tried to make the couch homier.
meanings.sent4: The old armchair felt homier than any other seat.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies baking made the kitchen homier.

meanings.sent1: The worn-out slippers were homier than new ones.
meanings.sent2: The familiar scent of lavender made the room homier.
meanings.sent3: The cozy sweater felt even homier after a long day.
meanings.sent4: The old bookshop was homier than any modern store.
meanings.sent5: The sound of rain on the roof made the house feel homier.

meanings.definition: Making a place feel like home.
meanings.sent1: The family photos on the wall made the room homier.
meanings.sent2: The friendly neighbors made the street homier.
meanings.sent3: The familiar music playing made the party homier.
meanings.sent4: The cozy atmosphere of the cafe made it homier than others.
meanings.sent5: The warm welcome made the new guest feel homier.
